import React, { useState } from 'react'; function Login() { const [email, setEmail] = useState(''); const [password, setPassword] = useState(''); const [rememberMe, setRememberMe] = useState(false); const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false); const [error, setError] = useState(''); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setIsLoading(true); setError(''); // Simulate API call setTimeout(() => { console.log({ email, password, rememberMe }); setIsLoading(false); // Uncomment below to simulate an error // setError('Invalid email or password. Please try again.'); // Here we'll later call the backend API }, 1000); }; return (
